input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Personnel

Location: East Hampton, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Accurate pay range: $20 to $22 per hour. 

Please note you are applying to a Life Storage branded store operated by Extra Space Storage.

Working for Extra Space Storage, you will have the opportunity to be part of a diverse team with excellent company culture. Extra Space Storage was listed in the Top 100 Best Places to Work for in 2020 on Glassdoor. We are the fastest-growing storage company with over 2,000 locations nationwide and can provide you with incredible career and development opportunities.

We are looking for a Maintenance Worker that will demonstrate entry-level knowledge of basic building maintenance and some trade support, i.e., basic electrical, plumbing, masonry, custodial, carpentry, painting, doors, roofs, golf carts, etc. The position provides services for single or multiple locations within a District.

Benefits We Offer You

Outstanding company culture; including steady work hours and work/life balanceCompetitive starting payPaid Time Off accrued throughout the year, increasing with years of serviceCareer opportunities throughout the United StatesGenerous 401(k) match with Traditional and/or ROTH choicesAffordable Health Insurance/medical benefit options with up to a $1,000 annual Health Savings Account employer contributionEXTRA Healthy Wellness program that includes the potential for $70 each month in credits towards your medical premium and $100 in annual rewards for participationEducation support program (pursuit of bachelor’s degree)BenefitHub discounts: apparel, auto, electronics, entertainment, pets, travel, etc.

Responsibilities

Ensures that company standards of cleanliness and appearance are met or exceeded in offices, restrooms, exterior areas, company units, hallways, etc.Cleans vacated units on a timely basis (examines units to ensure that doors, latches, and alarms are functional)Makes pest control inspections and takes appropriate actionsEnsures that the safe handling and storage of chemicals and cleaners used in performing duties is in compliance with safety standardsMonitors the physical condition of the facility and reports maintenance requirements and potential equipment failures to the Store ManagerPerforms minor nonstructural carpentry repairs and replacements on doors, fences, and buildings as required. May also do minor plumbing and electrical repairsPerforms touch up painting and landscape maintenance on the propertyEnsures the facility has sufficient supplies on hand to fulfill job dutiesDemonstrates a general knowledge of site management that includes customer service skills and daily operational knowledgePerforms other duties as assigned; works with minimum direct supervision; operates effectively on a teamMaintains a safe environment for employees and customers

Qualifications

High School Diploma or GED Equivalent3-6 months of related experience and/or trainingDriver’s License and access to reliable transportation

Compensation

$20 to $22 Hourly

If you are a current Extra Space employee, please apply through Jobs Hub in Workday.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Maintenance Personnel
output_json.summary: Maintenance Worker required for a Life Storage branded store operated by Extra Space Storage.
job_responsibilities: Ensures cleanliness and appearance standards are met or exceeded.
Performs pest control inspections and takes necessary actions.
Ensures safe handling and storage of chemicals and cleaners.
Monitors facility condition and reports maintenance needs.
Performs minor carpentry, plumbing, and electrical repairs.
Carries out touch-up painting and landscape maintenance.
Demonstrates site management knowledge including customer service and operations.
benefits: Steady work hours and work/life balance.
Competitive starting pay with paid time off increasing with years of service.
Generous 401(k) match with Traditional and/or ROTH options.
Affordable health insurance with up to $1,000 annual Health Savings Account employer contribution.
EXTRA Healthy Wellness program offering monthly credits towards medical premiums and annual rewards.
Education support program for pursuing a bachelor’s degree.
BenefitHub discounts on various products and services.
output_json.company_information: Extra Space Storage is a rapidly expanding storage company with over 2,000 locations nationwide.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal opportunity employer valuing diversity. No discrimination based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
